name: Art lost in time
description:
In 1985 Andy Warhol created a portrait of singer Debbie Harry using brand new Amiga 1000 computer. This was just a promotional stunt organized by people from Commodore.

However Warhol kept the computer he was given by Commodore and actually used it to make some art.

Now after 30 years is up to you to use all your retrocomputing skills to retrieve ART LOST IN TIME...

* * *

Inspired by documentary on Warhol & Amiga.

As there is no music, so I recommend to listen Amiga Music: Thunder Compilation #2 or some Velvet Undeground.

Drawn mostly in jspaint.app. I used my own game engine (from WIP game) and actual digital art by Andy Warhol. I hope this is fair use.

Challenges taken:

  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette. (iny my case jspaint pallete)
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
